    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Draw.Options create()

      • setDrawTime

        public final void setDrawTime(int drawTime)
        Parameters:
        drawTime - - Determines how much time to wait before adding a new point when using a freehand tool. The default value is 75.

      • showTooltips

        public final void showTooltips(boolean showToolTips)
        Parameters:
        showToolTips - - If true, tooltips are displayed when creating new graphics with the draw toolbar. The default value is true.

      • setTolerance

        public final void setTolerance(int tolerance)
        Parameters:
        tolerance - - Determines how far the mouse moves before adding a new point when using one of the freehand tools. The default value is 8.

      • setTooltipOffset

        public final void setTooltipOffset(int tooltipOffset)
        Parameters:
        tooltipOffset - - Determines how farm to offset the tool tip from the mouse pointer. The default value is 15.
